question: Question 15-12/12/2023.1 As new fuel is being loaded into the core, the reactor operator is using a 1/M plot to monitor core loading. Which ONE of the following conditions could result in the OVER prediction of the number of fuel rods needed for criticality?

answers.feedback: Incorrect. REF: Burn, Introduction to Nuclear Reactor Operations, Section 5.5, p. 5-18 & 5-23

answers.answer: d. The detector is located so that core load starts away from the detector and subsequent loading proceeds towards the detector.
